message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  I'd be happy to pay $85.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $105 is still a little high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $100. This is the lowest I can go.
